name: WH Cache & Security
author: WebHue

sections.description:
Smart Cache and full security your site. Some plugin cache not work fine with security plugin, so We Created this plugin. It work fine on Cache, Security and mobile plugin

Supported features:

  • Cache
  • Cache on server
  • Cache on browser
  • Store compressed pages
  • Send compressed pages
  • Security
  • Smart ban IP locked by other site install this plugin(sync ban ip)
  • Ban Ip, User Agents
  • Cache on browser
  • Limit Login
  • Notification if login limited
  • Enforce Front end, Back end, Login with SSL
sections.installation:
This section describes how to install the plugin and get it working.

  1. Upload plugin folder to the /wp-content/plugins/ directory
  2. Activate the plugin through the menu in WordPress
sections.changelog:
1.0.1

  • Create plugin

1.0.2

  • fix change plugin folder name

1.0.3

  • fix cache for admin user

1.0.4

  • Add restore featured

1.0.5

  • Add cache media (js,image,css) featured

1.0.6

  • Add featured limit ip login and fix comment cache

1.0.7

  • Add featured auto ban and sync ban ip

1.0.8

  • fix default options, disable cache user logged in , fix logs login

1.0.9

  • add featured show text need add to .htacess and wp-config.php

1.1.0

  • add featured hide admin (enable it in security tab)

1.1.1

  • fix nginx server rewrite
